title: How Many Clients Can   Share a Market Report or Portfolio With
chunk_text: If you are currently utilizing the client share portal and would like to see how many client licenses your organization has available, select Tools, then Client Share Portal.

metadata.topic: Accessing Client License Information in Client Share Portal

title: How Many Clients Can   Share a Market Report or Portfolio With
chunk_text: This view will show you the total number of client licenses your organization has, how many are currently assigned, and how many are available for assignment.

title: How Many Clients Can   Share a Market Report or Portfolio With
chunk_text: If your organization would like to increase the total number of client licenses beyond five, you can reach out to serviceamstatcp.com to request additional licenses.

title: How Many Clients Can   Share a Market Report or Portfolio With
chunk_text: If you prefer to stay within the total of five licenses, you can manage your licenses using two icons: one to unassign a license and another to delete a client.

metadata.topic: Managing Licenses: Unassigning and Deleting Clients
